entry.title: LCD Screen and Digitizer Assembly Without Frame Compatible For Google Pixel 5
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: LCD & Digitizer
Price: 299.99

Looking for a Google Pixel 5 screen replacement? If you dropped your Google Pixel 5 and broke the front glass it can be repaired!

You can replace your broken Google Pixel 5 screen using our high-quality replacement part. Don't hesitate to contact our support team for any questions or concerns.

For customers who demand the same standard as original repair parts, Our Google parts have you covered.

  • LCD & Digitizer Assembly
  • Touch Digitizer and IC
  • Glass Lens
  • Backlight
  • Flex Cable
  • Lifetime Warranty

Lifetime Warranty

The Replacement Google Pixel 5 LCD Screens and Digitizers come with a lifetime warranty, as the other Google LCD Replacement Parts.

Part Type LCD Screens and Digitizer
Compatible Model Google Pixel 5 (G5NZ6, GD1YQ, GTT9Q)
Screen Type LCD & Digitizer
Manufacturer Unlockr Parts
Warranty Lifetime Warranty

entry.title: Replacement Battery Compatible With Google Pixel 4a
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck Battery
Type: Battery
Price: 15.99

You have a Google Pixel 4a that no longer holds a charge the way it did when it was new?

Your Google Pixel 4a shuts down unexpectedly?

Does your cell phone only work when the battery is plugged in?

Those are common symptoms that a defective battery will have.

It is time to get a new Google Pixel 4a replacement battery.

The old battery in your cell phone can swell inside and damage the internals.

Our Batteries for Google Pixel 4a are brand-new batteries coming directly from our manufacturer. They are custom-built for customers who demand the same quality as original Google batteries. 

  • Zero cycle count
  • Tested under extreme weather
  • 100% New with premium components
  • High output current capacity
  • 1 Year Warranty

Compatibility

This battery is only compatible with a Google Pixel 4a.

Warranty

The Replacement Google Pixel 4a Battery comes with a 1-year warranty, as the other Google Battery Replacement Parts.

Part Type Battery
Compatible Model Google Pixel 4a
Warranty 1 Year Warranty

entry.summary:
Vendor: Jerry
Type: Tempered Glass
Price: 2.79 - 2.99 (7 variants)

Tempered Glass for Google Pixel 3 Series. It adds a layer of protection on the screen of your device to protect it from breaking and scratching. They include oleophobic coating to prevent fingerprints and provide extra protection. The high quality glass it's made of ensures original image clarity perfect touch sensitivity.

Warranty

The Replacement Tempered Glass come with a 1 year warranty, as the other tempered glasses. 

Part Type Google Tempered Glass
Compatible Model Pixel 3 / Pixel 3 XL / Pixel 3A / Pixel 3A XL / Pixel 4 / Pixel 4 XL

Compatible With Google Pixel
Warranty 1 Year Warranty

entry.title: Google Pixel 3 XL Wide Angle Front Camera
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Front Camera
Price: 11.99

Important Notice: This item can take 5-10 days to fulfill.


Replace a damaged or malfunctioning wide angle front-facing camera. This camera is compatible with a Google Pixel 3 XL smartphone. The Pixel 3 XL has two front-facing cameras. The wide angle camera is on the left when you are looking at the display.
